name: Becoming Huge
description:
This is a little platformer/speedrunner game made for the repl.it kajam 2021. It's been a wonderful experience and I saw an incredible amount of cool games!

The theme was "HUGE", so I went for a little guy oppressed by bullies that dreams to become huge. In order to achieve his goal, he needs to collect all the protein bars.

here it is the link to the web version: https://replit.com/@Proiz/Becomin-Huge-kajam2021?v=1
*Attention* the web version has no sound and the fps is lower, so I suggest to download the exe version here!
